channel.title: Can anyone explain the safe zone format?
channel.description:
(absX >= 2668 && absX <= 2683 && absY >= 3414 && absY <= 3429) ||
alright, I don't get it! I want to make an area a safe zone, but I don't understand the coords. Can someone tell me what they mean? Like this: (absX >= TOP RIGHT CORNER && absX <= TOP LEFT CORNER && absY >= LOW RIGHT CORNER && absY <= LOW LEFT CORNER) ||
I doubt thats right, but can someone explain the safe zone format as shone above? Thanks ~Matt~

item.title: Can anyone explain the safe zone format?
item.dc:creator: @MMcgrady1 MMcgrady1
item.description:
@MMcgrady1 wrote:

-.- im not a retard…I know what he means, but thats not working.

Read full topic

item.title: Can anyone explain the safe zone format?
item.dc:creator: @FLIPPER182 FLIPPER182
item.description:
@FLIPPER182 wrote:

NorthWest(x)---------North East(y) | | | | | | | | SouthWest(y)----------SouthEast(x)
MMcgrady1 thats not a code btw if u were trying to add lol

Read full topic

item.title: Can anyone explain the safe zone format?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

i think this is right

NW(x)---------NE(y)
| |
| |
| |
| |
SW(y)----------SE(x)

i hope that helps
